sentence: We told you Tuesday that Herschel Walker blasted the Biden administration's weak? response to the unfolding Russian invasion of the Ukraine during another stop in Dahlonega.

title: The Jolt: Herschel Walker: I don't support either' Brian Kemp or David Perdue

title: Herschel Walker says he doesn't support 'either' Kemp or Perdue
